akas: Mako: Island of Secrets Australia (new title)
Mako Mermaids - Vita da tritone Italy
Mako Mermaids: An H2O Adventure World-wide (English title) (alternative title)
akas from release info: Mako: Island of Secrets Australia (new title)
Mako Mermaids - Vita da tritone Italy
Mako Mermaids: An H2O Adventure World-wide (English title) (alternative title)

1.title: A Visit from the East
1.plot: Ondina is tasked with teaching young mermaids. Rita introduces Weilan, a Chinese mermaid, who will be staying with them. On the way to the Full Moon Ceremony, the girls encounter a water dragon. Weilan warns that there is no way to stop it.

2.title: Seeing Is Believing
2.plot: When marine park workers are sent to investigate the sea monster, the mermaids most create a credible explanation to stop further inquires.

3.title: Recipe for Success
3.plot: Weilan casts a knowledge transference spell on Zac to help him pass a biology test. But more than just science facts transfer from her body to his!

4.title: Mopping Up
4.plot: When Evie tries using her new moon ring to magically finish her chores, things quickly get out of control. Joe makes an upsetting announcement.

5.title: The Puzzle Box
5.plot: Weilan comes up with the idea of using a Chinese Puzzle Box to trap the sea dragon. Cam panics when Carly suggests they take dance lessons.

6.title: New Beginnings
6.plot: Evie's moon ring lesson with Ondina takes an unexpected turn. At the Marine Park, Mimmi discovers the real reason for a rescued dolphin's distress.

7.title: Turning the Tide
7.plot: Zac begs Weilan to teach him an Eastern spell that he plans to use against the dragon. Mimmi and Ondina cover for David at the Ocean Cafe, but they encounter problems with Joe and a water ball.

8.title: The Way of the Dragon
8.plot: On the eve of the full moon, Mimmi and Ondina defy Veridia's order of watching the hatchlings. Evie becomes suspicious when she spots Zac and Weilan meeting in secret again.

9.title: Reversal of Fortune
9.plot: Feeling guilty for Evie's loss, Weilan runs away. Mimmi and Ondina try to restore Evie's tail.

10.title: Wishful Thinking
10.plot: Zac finds a shell in Mako. Without realizing it's magical, he makes a wish, sending the mermaids five years back in time.

11.title: Lost and Found
11.plot: While teaching the younger mermaids how to walk on land, Ondina and Weilan lose a mermaid in Mako that soon, runs into Chris and Karl on the beach.

12.title: Trust Issues
12.plot: Mimmi and Chris go on their first date and Ondina does everything to protect her. Cam makes changes to the Café.

13.title: Letting Go
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Age Before Beauty
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: The Legend of Jiao Long
15.plot: A priceless artifact recovered by a deep-sea treasure hunter provides a clue as to how the mermaids can defeat the water dragon.

16.title: Homecoming
16.plot: The vision reappears to Mimmi and Zac, this time speaking to them. Weilan learns a new detail about the dragon legend that suggests Nerissa is alive.

1.title: Outcasts
1.plot: It's a full moon and the three mermaids Nixie, Lyla and Sirena are tasked to guard Mako and the moon pool. While Zac and Cam go camping on Mako island. When Zac falls into the moon pool they don't know what to do and leave him on the beach. The next day Zac finds out what he is and what he can do so he tells Cam. Because the girls let the "land boy" as they call him in the moon pool they are being cast out by their pod. So they decide to fix the problem.

2.title: Getting Legs
2.plot: Sirena, Lyla and Nixie must turn Zac back into a land boy. Using Sirena's Moon Ring, they give themselves legs and walk on land to begin their task.

3.title: Meeting Rita
3.plot: In trying to get the Moon Ring back, the mermaids uncover Rita's secret.

4.title: Lyla Alone
4.plot: Nixie and Sirena won't help Lyla try to "zap" Zac's powers, so Lyla decides to do it alone. This misfires when a waitress spills a drink on Lyla and Lyla rushes to hide in the refrigeration room before she transforms into a mermaid! When she can't dry her tail, Nixie and Sirena must save her before she is discovered!

5.title: Blizzard
5.plot: Lyla and Sirena attempt to use the Moon Ring to stop the rain, but instead make it snow indoors.

6.title: Dolphin Tale
6.plot: Joe, David's brother has bought a new boat and decides to take it out for a spin. His fish finder locates a dolphin, but that dolphin is actually Nixie.

7.title: Zac's Pool Party
7.plot: Zac's struggle with his merman secret intensifies when his girlfriend, Evie decides to throw him a pool party.

8.title: Zac's Return to Mako
8.plot: It's a full moon and the mermaids think that if they keep Zac out of the moonlight, he will lose his powers and return to his land-dwelling self. They stay with him in his garage on the full moon and attempt to keep him indoors

9.title: The Siren
9.plot: While listening to Sirena sing, Lyla has an idea. If Sirena sings The Enchantment Song to Zac, he will fall under her spell. Everything goes south when David hears the song and falls in love with Nixie.

10.title: Zac Returns to Mako
10.plot: Against Nixie and Sirena's advice, Lyla goes with Zac to Mako Island. She steals Rita's Moon Ring to open the land entrance on Mako. But when the entrance suddenly closes, Zac and Lyla are trapped inside.

11.title: I Don't Believe in Mermaids
11.plot: The girls fear their pod will never return. A despondent Nixie gives "advice" to a young boy named Ben. Zac researches tridents online and Cam snoops. Rita tells Lyla and Sirena about the trident and a pod of mermen that rose up eons ago.

12.title: Close Call
12.plot: Zac continues to try to find the trident. Lyla focuses on keeping him from it. Rita won't keep giving the girls money so Sirena makes bracelets for the Café to sell. While Sirena gathers shell for them, Zac catches a glimpse of her tail.

13.title: Betrayal
13.plot: Rita and the girls worry about the upcoming full moon's effect on Zac. Nixie thinks they should let Zac find the trident so they can take it from him and hide it. Lyla thinks they should come clean with him so he'll in hopes that he'll understand and stay away from it. While Lyla warns Zac to keep away from Mako Island during the full moon, Evie sees them holding hands and breaks up with him. Cam discovers that the girls know Zac's secret but feels uneasy about them helping him. Under the light of the full moon, Zac goes after the trident with the girls close behind. ...

14.title: Battlelines
14.plot: Rita begins training the girls since they didn't finish mermaid school, starting with creating and controlling storms. Zac and Cam are suspicious that Rita is a mermaid. Cam thinks threatening her exposure could mean a free ride at school.

15.title: Sirena's Secret
15.plot: Rita continues to train the girls (this time, how to squeeze lemons from a distance using their fingers). David is holding auditions for a singer to join him in performing at the Ocean Café. Zac gives Evie a glass figurine of two dolphins for their eight month anniversary. Lyla and Nixie see how Sirena and David interact with each other and become concerned that if she gets the singing position, they'll fall further in love and Sirena will leave the pod forever (just like Rita did). Sirena tries out and sounds terrific but Lyla and Nixie interfere using the technique ...

16.title: Truce
16.plot: Cam takes a video of Zac swimming as a merman. Cam annoys Nixie at the Café, so she sends his phone flying. The girls clash with the boys on how to get it back. When Cam & Nixie deduce what really happened to it, they quickly hatch a plan.

17.title: Moon Ring 2
17.plot: Rita continues to train the girls (to control water, whatever form it takes). Zac finds a moon ring stuck in a rock on the ocean floor. He breaks it out and gives it to Evie as a gift. The girls confront Zac about how dangerous the ring could be once it gets hit with moonlight. He agrees to get it back from Evie but not to hand it over to the mermaids. Zac's parents have Rita over for lunch. Zac invites Cam and Evie too with a plan to get the ring back. The girls show up lying that Rita invited them so they can alert Rita to the situation. Zac gets hold of the ring ...

18.title: The Trident Job
18.plot: The Halloween costume party at the Ocean Café falls on a full moon. The girls are suspicious that Zac will ditch the party and head to Mako Island so they vow to keep an eye on him all night. Can they stop him from getting the trident?

19.title: Where's the On Button?
19.plot: Zac can't get the trident to do anything so he hatches a plan to snoop around Rita's house. While Evie interviews her at home for the school's magazine, he sneaks about and discovers her secret room.

20.title: Nowhere to Hide
20.plot: The Trident is active and dangerous, and the mermaids must take it from Zac. Knowing this, Zac searches for the perfect hiding place.

21.title: Aquata Returns
21.plot: While swimming, Zac sees Aquata who flees to the Moon Pool, reuniting with her sister. Aquata informs Sirena that she may return to the pod. Zac uses the trident to find the Moon Pool. With Sirena gone, Lyla and Nixie confront Zac and Cam.

22.title: Evie Times Two
22.plot: David delivers Rita's fish order with Evie tagging along to snoop. Poseidon steps through a puddle of mixed mermaid phials transforming him into Evie's doppelgänger. Zac & Lyla keep an eye on Poseidon while Nixie & Sirena find an antidote.

23.title: Zac's Choice
23.plot: Lyla goes to check that the trident is still hidden and watches Zac and Cam find it. While attempting to wrestle it away from Zac, it zaps her into unconsciousness. Now realizing the extent of the trident's danger, Zac must make a choice.

24.title: Trust
24.plot: Cam is mad at Zac for returning the trident. Rita invites Zac to train with the girls but Nixie still doesn't trust him. As Lyla & Zac spend more time together, Nixie becomes more upset and decides to ally with Cam to return Zac to normal.

25.title: Betrayed
25.plot: Zac has a nightmare involving the trident and the Moon Pool. Cam apologizes to him and expresses his disappointment in Zac's locking it back up. Zac almost tells Evie his secret. Cam approaches Nixie with a bogus story and a plan for the two of them to "put the trident out of Zac's reach." Evie tags along with Cam to Mako Island. Nixie, displeased by Evie's being there, opens the cave with a stolen Moon Ring so Cam and Evie may go in. The two enter the water chamber and Cam takes a hold of the trident. With the Moon Ring losing its power, Cam makes it out, leaving ...

26.title: Decision Time
26.plot: Cam apologizes to Zac for his betrayal but keeps the trident hidden. The girls look forward to returning to the pod. Everyone catches on to Cam's scheme and races to Mako Island. Will they stop Cam and be allowed to return to the pod?

1.title: The Seventh Cycle
1.plot: Ondina and Mimmi run away from the Pod to help Sirena take Zac's power.

2.title: Sticky Situation
2.plot: Evie tries to adjust to her new situation with Zac's help. Sirena pressures Ondina and Mimmi to change Evie back. Carly and Erik become suspicious when Cam blocks the entrance to the cool room where Sirena is hiding Evie.

3.title: Discovery
3.plot: Sirena uses her moon ring to simulate a full moon to test it's effect on Zac. He has visions involving his connection to Mako Island. He and the girls go there to investigate. After overhearing about the island, Erik goes to explore it.

4.title: A New Tail
4.plot: Zac tries to convince Evie that there are good things about having a tail. Erik takes a seafood delivery to Rita's house and questions Ondina about Mako Island. Secrets are revealed.

5.title: Bad for Business
5.plot: Evie discovers that her father Doug has decided to branch out with his tourist diving charter... to Mako Island. Erik asks Zac to hang out since they both know each other's secrets now. Evie tells the gang about her father's new diving destination and the girls are not happy, especially Ondina. When the air compressor on Doug's boat suddenly breaks, Zac suspects Ondina. After learning that she was trapped in the Moon Pool with Sirena and Mimmi, Zac figures out who the culprit really was.

6.title: Stormy Seas
6.plot: Lifeguard Cam is left in charge of the beach and his boss' son. Sirena gives Evie lessons on using her mermaid powers much to the disdain of Ondina. Erik questions Cam about his lost friendship with Zac while dealing with bothersome Ned.

7.title: Awakening
7.plot: Ondina wants to sever Zac's connection with Mako Island. Zac and Evie wish to stay indoors together to help each other the night of the full moon. Zac's father reminds Zac that he, Zac, and Cam will be going on their annual camping trip to Mako Island... the night of the full moon. Erik suggests that he goes too. Cam agrees but Zac does not. The girls decide to keep an eye on Evie at her house. When Carly shows up, they pretend that Evie is sick but she still stays. Mimmi has a vision of Mako Island when the moon begins to effect Zac. Ondina and Mimmi leave Sirena ...

8.title: Land School
8.plot: It's the first day of the new school year and Mimmi wants to know all about it. She follows Rita there and sits in on a science class where she makes quite an impression the teacher. Erik shows Cam the photos he took in the Merman Chamber.

9.title: Stowaway
9.plot: Ondina meets with the mermaid council to discuss Zac and Mako Island but she doesn't tell them about Erik and Evie. A young mermaid named Neptina follows her back and volunteers to help. Neppy finds Erik and follows him causing mischief.

10.title: Keeping the Secret
10.plot: Evie's father Doug accidentally drops his sentimental watch overboard so, when no one is around, Evie goes in to retrieve it. Sirena helps David with a fish delivery to Doug's boat. While they wait for him, David sees Evie swim past! He doesn't realize it was her but is convinced he saw a mermaid. Ondina enlists Erik's help to try to get David to forget about what he saw to no avail. Zac tries to help Evie find her father's watch before Doug has them go snorkeling together to find it. Sirena wants to come clean to David but the rest of the gang think it is a bad idea....

11.title: Only as Young as You Feel
11.plot: Sirena and Mimmi make a lotion that helps keep you young. Ondina uses it all so she makes a slapdash batch to replace it. Rita uses some before going on a class trip. Rita begins acting childish as a result and could end up in hot water.

12.title: Supersized
12.plot: Joe gives David small crayfish for the Café so Mimmi uses magic to make them larger but loses her Moon Ring in the cool room. Zac and Evie help Doug install a sprinkler system. Zac has a vision of Mimmi and goes to her rescue.

13.title: Reunion
13.plot: On the night of the full moon, Sirena takes Evie to the Moon Pool to help her control the moon spell. Veridia, Ondina, and Mimmi go to the Merman Chamber where Zac and Erik are trying to unlock it. Secrets are revealed.

14.title: A New Man
14.plot: Zac struggles with the truth that he is a real merman, his parents aren't his "real" parents, and that Mimmi is his natural sister. Ondina is still mad at Erik. Carly and Sirena plan a surprise party for David (Café's second anniversary).

1.title: A New Man
1.plot: Zac Struggles to come to terms with the news that he's a real merman, adopted and has a new sister.

2.title: Careful What You Wish For
2.plot: Cam discovers he has a power, which hes takes advantage of by using it to get him a place in the trials for the school swim team.

3.title: First Date
3.plot: Ondina sneaks Erik into the grotto to create a duplicate a pearl that he gave her, but she makes the mistake of turning him into a copy of Poseidon.

4.title: The Merman Code
4.plot: When Erik dives down and touches one of the rock outcrops on Mako reef, he's transported into a sphere of endless water with no way out.

5.title: The Siren
5.plot: Sirena sees a video of a kayaker being lured by a mermaid song and becomes obsessive about David.

6.title: Surprise!
6.plot: Surprise birthday party for Evie comes with some surprising consequences.

7.title: The Job
7.plot: Mimmi gets a job at the Marine Park. There she meets Chris who works a popcorn cart and desperately wants to get in the dolphin training program. Since everyone else has a job, Ondina decides to get one too but it doesn't go so well.

8.title: New Orders
8.plot: Ondina is given the task of destroying the Merman Chamber on Mako Island during the full moon by Veridia. Rita tells Zac about the merman who built the chamber and why he decided not to activate it.

9.title: The Last Dance
9.plot: Ondina is faced with a choice: staying on land with Erik or returning to the pod. Erik rents out the Café to throw a party for Ondina but Mimmi is suspicious of how he is affording it. Cam pursues Carly romantically.

10.title: Stay or Go
10.plot: Mimmi is upset that Ondina has decided to stay on land. Cam takes Carly fishing near Mako Island for their first date and run into some trouble. At the Marine Park, a bratty girl sees Ondina and Mimmi transform.

11.title: The Truth About Evie
11.plot: Evie catches her father's cold which throws her mermaid powers into a frenzy. Things get worse when Sirena, Mimmi, and Ondina catch it. With David gone, Carly is left in charge of the busy Café. When Erik shows up late again, she fires him.

12.title: The Trident Stone
12.plot: Erik learns that the stone from the trident is all he needs to start up the Merman Chamber. If activated, the chamber will drain all mermaids' powers. Cam is given the stone for safekeeping and has a tough decision to make.

13.title: The Chosen One
13.plot: Erik is determined to activate the Merman Chamber even though Ondina begs him not to. Zac feels powerless without his magic and seems to give up. The mermaids decide to try to destroy the chamber. The chamber's true purpose is revealed.

locations: 21, Brakes Crescent, Miami, Queensland, Australia::(Rita's House)
Sea World, Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia::(Underwater Scenes)
Southport Pier, Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia::(The Ocean Cafe)
Somerset College - 34 Clover Hill Dr, Mudgeeraba, Queensland, Australia::(Suncoast High)
Burleigh Heads, Queensland, Australia::(Mako Island seashore)
imdb.plot outline: During a trip to Mako Island, Zac gets in touch with the water of the magic Moon Pool in a night of full Moon, gaining a merman tail and the power to manipulate water. Sirena, Nixie and Lyla, three mermaids who guard Mako Island, are sent to mainland by their fellow mermaids to deprive Zac of his powers, otherwise they will be forever banned from the island.
imdb.title: Mako Mermaids
plot: A young man is magically turned a merman, and discovers his underwater origins, after he comes in contact with the magic waters at the mysterious Mako Island guarded by a trio of mermaids.::Anonymous

During a trip to Mako Island, Zac gets in touch with the water of the magic Moon Pool in a night of full Moon, gaining a merman tail and the power to manipulate water. Sirena, Nixie and Lyla, three mermaids who guard Mako Island, are sent to mainland by their fellow mermaids to deprive Zac of his powers, otherwise they will be forever banned from the island.::EliOrni

Mako Island is protected by a pod of mermaids, during the full moon it's the job of Lyla, Nixie and Sirena, but things don't go to plan. Land boy Zac Blakely falls into the sacred mermaid Moon Pool gaining a tail and powers.
